Generate manifest via schematic service

Source: R/annotation_qc.R
manifest_generate.Rd

See schematic manifest generation. Note that this uses the access token of user that should already be logged in with syn_login.

Usage

manifest_generate(
  data_type,
  dataset_id = NULL,
  title = data_type,
  schema_url =
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nf-osi/nf-metadata-dictionary/main/NF.jsonld",
  asset_view = "syn16858331",
  output_format = "excel",
  use_annotations = TRUE,
  service = "https://schematic.api.sagebionetworks.org/v1/manifest/generate"
)

Arguments

data_type

Data type of the manifest to generate (aka Component).

dataset_id

Optional, if given this fills out manifest for existing dataset instead of generating a blank manifest.

title

Optional, custom title.

schema_url

Optional, defaults to main NF 'latest' data model.

asset_view

Optional, defaults to main NF portal fileview.

output_format

Format of 'excel', 'google_sheet', or 'dataframe'. Defaults to 'excel'.

use_annotations

Use annotations if filling out manifest for existing dataset. Defaults to TRUE for NF.

service

Service endpoint to use. Defaults to the schematic production endpoint.

Value

For excel, path to local file; for google_sheet, URL to sheet; for dataframe, JSON string of data.
